file_content.text: I have always loved the stars.
Your death was too good to be true. You can't fool me.
I knew you weren't dead.
Deception was not my desire. You deserve truth.
Get out of my mind.
You won't control me again. I'm stronger than I was back then.
Yes, I feel it.
You can invade my mind, but I'll never become one of your Children.
I no longer require a slave.
I don't know how you're in my head, but I've got unlimited ammo here.
You have nothing to fear.
My brain isn't big enough for the both of us.
Then we must expand it.
You can enter my mind, but I won't bend to your will. I am no longer your Wrath.
You have always been more than a title.
I always hoped I'd add your spirit to my collection.
I could say the same. This meeting is long overdue.
You made a mistake getting inside my head. Just wait'll you see my dreams.
I look forward to them.
Just what I needed--one more mental stowaway to ignore.
You do have a crowded mind.
The next time we fight I'll drop you into one of them. See if that finishes you off.
Maybe a star can kill you.
You would not be the first to try, but you could be the first to succeed.
You are much more than merely a Jedi.
To call you Sith is to ignore your true self.
You cannot wield the Force, yet you triumph over powers far greater.
You have earned my respect. I followed you here so we might speak undisturbed.
You've changed.
You're not the same Emperor I fought on Dromund Kaas or Ziost.
Everything changes. You most of all.
Do you finally see the futility of the dark side?
I have evolved beyond light and dark. So will you.
The true Emperor follows no one. You are not him.
You focus too much on the past. All things evolve.
You've grown quite humble. Do you finally accept my superiority?
I accept the need for change--and so must you.
You're not the same lunatic I fought back on Ziost.
I am, and am not. Change overtakes us all in the end.
I don't have time for you.
Too bad--I'm not listening.
On the contrary, time is all you have. Use it to evolve.
You're not planning to propose, are you?
Are you flirting with me?
Do not play the fool. The galaxy changes and we must change with it.
Your true believers. You gave their lives purpose and meaning.
A doubting Jedi....
The broken healer...
A mechanical servant....
A lost soldier....
And the unrepentant traitor.
They were useful when you did not know yourself. But now, you are complete.
I thought you knew all my secrets. You didn't know I fell in love?
Not without my true love.
Even a powerful Jedi is better when they have allies they can count on.
Nothing beats a good team-up.
Yours already forget you.
You want to isolate me. It won't work.
The Barsen'thor's loyal crew. Strange company for a Warden of the Order.
There's the bestial seeker....
A dissolute gambler....
The spiteful revolutionary....
A foolish idealist....
And your naive acolyte.
Why do you keep them? Is it obligation, pity, or simple inertia?
Some bonds run deeper than any of those things. I found love with one of them.
For one of them, it's love.
You violated your Jedi Code. Impressive.
I follow the will of the Force where it leads. It guided me to join them.
The Force brought us together.
And if the Force pulls you apart again, what then?
I will accept that if I must.
Your Havoc Squad. Its members followed you beyond all reason.
The bitter survivor....
A self-righteous defector...
A mindless patriot....
The scheming manipulator....
And a perpetual outsider.
What becomes of soldiers without their leader? Warriors who lose their cause?
Love keeps me fighting when nothing else will.
One of them loves me.
Havoc Squad's mission hasn't changed. They'll keep fighting.
They still have a cause.
Like machines executing a program. You are better than that.
A commander's nothing without troops. We rely on each other.
Your misfit crew. They aspire to your example but are merely shadows.
The sentimental gunman....
An apathetic monarch...
Your dutiful beast....
The artless fraud....
And a forsaken avenger.
You have no use for them.
I share a bunk with one. That's been pretty useful.
Being in love counts, right?
I trust them to watch my back. Besides, they make me look good.
They're loyal. That's enough.
Without you they are nothing.
Which is why I'm sure they're coming up with a plan to spring me.
Your servants. They cling to you like parasites on a predator.
Your thieving slave....
The smiling betrayer....
A deluded Jedi....
The homicidal savage....
And a reckless malcontent.
You suffered their existence for years. Even those who earned death.
One feeds my passion more than all the others combined.
One earned my love.
Most are loyal. I keep those who aren't as a reminder to never lower my guard.
Even traitors have their uses.
I once thought as you. It served me poorly.
They will not fail me. I will be freed from this prison.
Your acolytes. Rungs on the ladder of your ascent.
The ageless fiend....
An embittered pirate....
Your worshipful academic....
An impure Jedi....
And a bloodthirsty zealot.
They outlived their purpose long ago, yet you permit them to live.
I'm not yet in the habit of murdering those I love. Call me sentimental.
One is my lover.
Clever Sith keep their allies close. You never know when you'll need a sacrifice.
They may yet be useful.
You think you need them. You do not.
I'll decide that myself.
Your mercenary crew. They follow you out of self-interest.
The glory-seeking orphan....
A cowardly scoundrel....
The Mandalorian pretender....
A naive wanderer....
And a brutish psychopath.
You no longer need that outlaw band. You never did.
Maybe not all of them, but I've got someone special.
There's one I love.
I pay them to watch my back.
They have their uses.
Not anymore.
They'll find me if they know what's good for them.
Your conspirators. It is difficult to imagine a less trustworthy crew.
A charming sociopath....
An alienated diplomat....
The unassuming monster....
A wanted fugitive....
And an amoral machine.
Tell me, do they hope to rescue you... or confirm your demise?
I know one who wants me back alive. We're in love.
At least one of them loves me.
Love withers when it is neglected. Left alone too long, love will seek another.
We'll be together again.
It's a bit of both. That's why we work together so well.
Either way, they're useful.
You see them clearly.
Are you insulting my colleagues for a reason?
Over here!
[Call out to your allies.]
What will that accomplish?
I can stop talking to you.
Not all of us belong together. I'm not sure why they stay.
I'd replace some if I could.
You admit the truth.
Each day they drift further out of reach. Without a center to hold... without us... the galaxy and all within it spiral into chaos.
What's happening to me....
The carbon freezing was imperfect. Your body is poisoned. Dying.
Old foes have come to take your life.
I'm not afraid. None of this is real.
Nightmares can't hurt me.
Illusions can kill.
I beat them before. I'll do it again.
They'll fail.
If you want to live, you must fight.
I'm tired of talking. You want a fight? I'm ready!
Come on, then!
Yes. Good.
A debased apprentice....
Passion fades with distance.
You can stargaze later. We had an agreement.
What about our deal?
Patience. We can still achieve what I promised.
